div.ab: " [[ ]];x [[ ]]; [[mother ]];x Paaus, son of Pepas, mother Tasos;x Sokmenis, son of Kiapis, nick-named Tasoulis;x Potamon, son of Seis; Pesouris, son of Kaloukelis;x Satyros, son of Patarot, mother Ter...;x Pion, son of Peebaus, mother Taoz;x Zoilos, son of Leon, nick-named Ans....;x Tama, son of Miosis, son of Kolmes, mother Thermouthis;x Paaus, son of Peteimennis, mother Thinpathonis;x Penneous, son of Heraklas, mother Tamiosis;x Peebaus, son of Vestinus;[[ mother]]; [[Ta ]];[[Paaus, son of . . ., Kallis]]; [[mother Tesouthis]];x Pasion, son of Pasis Nakis;]Potamon, son of Kolmes;Paoneis, nick-named Teeltosis;[[ ]];Abonis, son of Paaus, mother Taes;[[A..., son of....a, mother T...]];Sokm., son of Tasoka;Psonthveos, son of Pathynis, grandson of Psonthneos, mother Taorma, nick-named Lykarion;;(Verso):;[[ ]];x Ptollas, son of Amais, mother Thaesis;Apestis, son of Lein, mother Thermouthis;Paonis Aphos;[[Penneous, son of Loukarion]];mother Tanis]];[[..., son of Paaus, mother]];Tamenis;Pathynis, son of Pathynis, grandson of Pames;[[Ammles, son of Paaus Kiasis]];Tasokis, nicknamed Amle;Paaus, son of Apis;Ol[[.]], son of Maximus;Potamon, son of Paaus, grandson of Apis;mother Tassoikis;Ptollas, son of Tiagora, mother;Taoz;Pathynis, his son, mother Thermouthis;Paonis, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Kol-;labes, mother Tanis;Paaus, son of Tikos, weaver, mother Ta-;nis;[[Pankras, son of So[[km.]]...]];Pa..an..mis, son of Thab[ ;........;Heras;;x Orsenouphis, son of Neilos K.....;[[...bais]] Kilikas, son of Esouris, grandson of Kilikas, mother Eserempis;[[Anamounis, son of Apynchis, mother]] ;[[Thenpathreios]];[[[[.an]] Pathynis, his brother with the same mother]];. . ., grandson of Harmiysis;. . . . , . . . . .
